item.title: Upgrade | Stash
item.description: Upgrading Stash This guide will show you how to upgrade the Stash operator. Here, we are going to show how to update the license and how to upgrade between two Stash versions. Upgrading Operator If you are using Stash v202X.X.X, you can easily upgrade to the latest version. At first, make sure that you have read the changelog of your desired version from here.
